tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: With recent condition where everything is online and on laptops kids have developed a serious issue of stiffness in neck and shoulder ..consulted dr lakshya and he was absolutely a brilliant help ..he explained the entire issue and also provided tips that have helped us to tackle the situation ..he has a brilliant command over his area ..completely satisfied with the consultation I had with him infact it was like dealing with a trusted family member

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Goel was very helpful. He listened to my query patiently and then gave a diagnosis. I was apprehensive about doing video consultations as I have never done one before, but was really happy with the ease and comfort of the entire process. I highly recommend Dr Lakshay Goel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
A brilliant doctor, always available for consultation.In fact I called him in emergency from abroad due episode of back pain and his advise was excellent and I could complete my trip.
Unlike many , he explains the reasons and underlying causes of the problem and how to resolve.

tags: None
review:
** ******* **** *** ** ***** ********* ** ******* ****** ****** ****** ********* ***** ******* He clearly understands the patient symptoms, investigates them properly, diagnose and suggests the right treatment. He is patient in his approach *** ********* ********* ** ****** ********* *** ********* ******** I would advise this doctor for any kind of back pain, sciatica or spinal issues including any chronic ones.
** ** * **** **** ************* ** *** *******

tags: None
review: I visited Dr. Lakshay goel's clinic and was very happy with the  experience. He gives time to his patients hearing them properly, never rushes them and provides * **** treatment ******* ******** *********** ****** My wife had plantar fasciitis and I had a thumb problem , both of which were dealt very well by him. He suggested us very useful exercises too regarding the same. If you are looking for a good orthopedics doctor , Dr. Lakshay goel is my recommendation.

tags: None
review:
**** * ******* *********** *********
Have been consulting him for the past 2 years ... for my cervical spasm, lumbar pain and an ankle twist ( yes I am pro- injuries !!), but without deviating from the topic, Dr. Lakshay has been on the mark with his diagnosis, immediate attention to the cause and 100% success in my case. I can vouch for his skill whole heartedly .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was barely able to walk due to sciatica pain.Dr. Lakshay suggested combination of exercises and medicines which made it better day by day. I am really thankful to him for his treatment as I got fit and fine in some days...I would strongly recommend him...thanks a ton doctor:-)

tags: None
review:
I saw Dr Lakshay when I broke my foot in winter. Not only he suggested an economic way of plaster that I should be using, he suggested many modifications in my daily life which could help decrease the chances of repeat injury.
He was very responsive and empathetic. Truly had a healing hand!! He works towards complete recovery! I would totally recommend him

tags: None
review: ** ** *** ** *** **** ***** * **** **** ******* Always available on call and for any kind of consultation. Very humble, soft spoken and full of confidence. Pays good attention to the patient. Treats his patients very diligently and efficiently. Highly recommended. Thanks Dr. Lakshay for always helping me out with my foot injury.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Lakshay was really helpful and attentive.

He calmly explained the problem, dos and don’t, the time it will take to heal

He is super friendly *** ************
